title: CRM for fighting sport schools
description: Manages all students with addresses, graduation status, and training progress.
Overview of all students participating in individual trainings through their registration.
Scheduling of trial trainings with automated email dispatching.

title: Color Palette Generator
description: Generate a color palette with enough variations for your development project.
Check directly through design examples whether the colors harmonize together.
Generate the corresponding CSS/SCSS code to easily integrate it into your project.

title: Letter to Number
description: Have you ever wanted to know the position of a letter in the alphabet, or determine which letter corresponds to a specific position?
Whether for password algorithms, alphabetical sorting, or escape room challenges, we believe this is a valuable skill to possess.

This app enables you to learn both directions using an index card system that selects letters or numbers to quiz you on. Watching your speed improve over time motivates you to continue mastering the conversion between letters and numbers.
